articles.title: NASA shares mesmerizing snapshot of Whirlpool Galaxy shot by Chandra, Hubble telescopes - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA recently shared a series of unseen images of the Whirlpool Galaxy on Instagram, showcasing its stunning beauty captured by the Chandra and Hubble Telescopes.
articles.content: NASA recently shared a stunning series of images showcasing the captivating beauty of the Whirlpool Galaxy, providing a glimpse into the mesmerizing wonders of our universe. Shared on Instagram, thes… [+2031 chars]

articles.title: Aircraft-sized asteroid set to pass Earth by a close margin today, reveals NASA; Check details - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA says as many as four asteroids have been predicted to pass Earth today, March 20, and one of them is as big as an aircraft! Know all about this close encounter with an aircraft-sized asteroid.
